DOC.detailed_description: 111 healthy , normolipemic men woman ( 18y 50y ) recruit monocentric , randomised , double-blind , control 4-week study . All volunteer consume 3 experimental product ( butter , dessert cream cake ) make one 3 specific milk fat 55 g fat/day .
DOC.criteria: HDL cholesterol , g/L > 0.4 Triacylglycerol g/L < 1.50 LDL Cholesterol g/L < 1.60 Waist size < 94 cm ( men ) 80 cm ( woman ) Affiliated National Health Insurance Normal blood pressure ( diastolic < 90 mm Hg , systolic < 140 mm Hg ) For woman : effective contraception Subject give his/her write informed consent Subject willing comply study procedure Reported food allergy Currently participate participate another clinical trial last 4 week prior begin study Hepatic renal impairment Positive serology HIV HCV , Blood donation do less 2 month start study Chronic pathology Refusal register National Volunteers Data file Being exclusion National Volunteers Data file
